entries.label: Sunny
entries.description: With the sun in the sky and the shadows short, you find it easy to see into the distance. Increase the encounter start distance result by 1 result.

entries.label: Raining
entries.description: Rain will wash away the tracks. Keep up your guard, least you get ambushed. Add 1d6 to all stealth rolls.

entries.label: Windy
entries.description: The wind whips away any projectiles and magical effects. At the start of each round roll a d4 and a direction.

entries.label: Snowing
entries.description: Snow makes it hard to hide. You roll twice on the travel table and take the worse option.
